welcome_message_body: Welcome to Thousand Oaks, where the picturesque landscapes and vibrant community charm all who visit. Get ready to explore our beautiful hiking trails, vibrant arts scene, and delicious dining options. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all this city has to offer!

restaurants.description: Toppers Pizza Place is a pizzeria located in Thousand Oaks.
restaurants.address: 1416 N Moorpark Rd (E Janns Rd.), Thousand Oaks, CA 91360
